about_the_game:
The Puzzle Factory is a 6 in 1 puzzle game including Wordsearches, Crosswords, Maths Platformer, Chess, Solitaire, Mahjong, and more suprises!
Featuring relaxing music, engaging and problem solving gameplay and beautiful HD Full Motion Video elements and packing a huge amount of value.

No ads, no fuss, just one great game, accessible for all ages.

-Over 40 Crosswords to have fun and challenge your brain with!
-20 Picture Slide Puzzles with nice feelings!
-Over 10 Maths challenge modes featuring a cat with a jetpack just for extra enjoyment!
-NEW! A beautiful 3D chess game with excellent AI, Spacefarer Chess is included!
-NEW! Addictive Solitaire with leaderboards!
NEW! Mahjong with different play styles and difficulty options with lovely graphics and relaxing sound.
